ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.TEXT: I am a passionate Software Engineer specializing in backend (Java, Spring Boot, Docker, AWS, PostgreSQL, Kafka, Redis, Cassandra). I also have experience as a fullstack and mobile developer (Angular, Flutter, Kotlin). I deliver robust, scalable solutions for both startups and personal projects.
ABOUT.EXPERIENCE_BLOCK: 2020â€“2023, Software Engineer, AcmeTech GmbH: Developed scalable backend microservices and integrated frontend components in cross-functional teams.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects
PROJECTS.EXPERIENCE: Experience as an in-house developer is described in the About section.

BACKEND.NAME: BillingCloud API
BACKEND.TECH: Java, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Kafka, Docker, AWS
BACKEND.DESC: Scalable backend for an enterprise-level billing SaaS platform. Handles invoicing, customer management, secure payments, and complex reporting with Kafka-driven event sourcing.

BACKEND.NAME: DocuSigner Microservice
BACKEND.TECH: Java, Spring Boot, Redis, Cassandra, AWS S3
BACKEND.DESC: Microservice for secure digital document storage, e-signature workflows, and compliance archiving. Integrates with AWS S3 for encrypted storage and real-time validation.

BACKEND.NAME: User Identity & Access Manager
BACKEND.TECH: Java, Spring Boot, Keycloak, PostgreSQL, Redis
BACKEND.DESC: Centralized identity and access management solution for distributed systems. Supports OAuth2, SSO, RBAC, and session management for enterprise-grade security.

BACKEND.NAME: Payments Processing Engine
BACKEND.TECH: Java, Spring Boot, Kafka, PostgreSQL, AWS
BACKEND.DESC: High-throughput payment gateway with real-time fraud detection, transactional messaging via Kafka, and resilient API design for fintech applications.

BACKEND.NAME: Realtime Collaboration Service
BACKEND.TECH: Java, Spring Boot, WebSocket, Redis, Docker
BACKEND.DESC: Backend for live document and whiteboard collaboration tools. Enables low-latency sync, concurrent editing, and activity auditing.

BACKEND.NAME: IoT Device Event Aggregator
BACKEND.TECH: Java, Spring Boot, Kafka, Cassandra, Docker, AWS
BACKEND.DESC: Distributed service for aggregating and processing IoT device telemetry. Built for time-series data, anomaly detection, and scalable cloud deployment.

FULLSTACK.NAME: SmartTask Flow
FULLSTACK.DESC: Fullstack task and project management system for SMEs. Includes real-time boards, user roles, and analytics dashboards with modern responsive UI.

FULLSTACK.NAME: eCommerce Admin Suite
FULLSTACK.TECH: Java, Spring Boot, Angular, PostgreSQL, Docker
FULLSTACK.DESC: Admin panel for managing product catalogs, order tracking, and customer insights for online stores. Secure authentication, API-first architecture.

FULLSTACK.NAME: HR Interview Portal
FULLSTACK.DESC: Platform for automating remote interviews, coding tests, and candidate ranking. Supports live feedback and report generation.

MOBILE.NAME: Wellness Tracker App
MOBILE.DESC: Mobile app for personal wellness tracking: exercise, nutrition, sleep, and mood logs with cloud sync and push notifications.

MOBILE.NAME: MiniCRM Mobile
MOBILE.DESC: Lightweight CRM mobile client for sales teams: contacts, pipeline, reminders, and instant chat.

MOBILE.NAME: SmartHome Dashboard
MOBILE.DESC: Progressive web app (PWA) for monitoring and controlling smart home devices, energy usage, and alerts in real time.
